attributes.action: provide in-depth, mandatory training for professionals working in Mental Health around Borderline Personality Disorder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Borderline Personality Disorder (BPD) is very misunderstood. It if often diagnosed to females under 22 years of age who have a history of depression and self-injury. Once this label has been stuck on a person, they are seen as being manipulative and are not given a very good standard of care. Doctors tend to dismiss this disorder as an attention-seeking behavioural problem and do not look to treat the symptoms or provide ongoing therapy.
